name: Refined Iron Axe
flavorText: A stronger, more durable axe.

name: Twin Axes
flavorText: One axe in each hand means double productivity. It makes sense.

name: Worn Pickaxe
description: Allows harvesting of basic metals and minerals.
flavorText: A basic pickaxe. Not much, but it gets the job done.

name: Lumberjack's Guild
flavorText: Form a guild to help your workers hone their skills.

name: Bronze Pickaxe
description: Allows harvesting of graphite and iron ore.
flavorText: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Sharpened Pickaxe
description: Decreases metal and mineral harvest time by 10%.
flavorText: A highly sharpened pickaxe. Mines at a much higher rate.

name: Bronze Axe
description: Allows harvesting of pine and birch trees.
flavorText: With this, you can bring down stronger and taller trees.

name: Iron Axe
description: Allows harvesting of eucalyptus and willow trees.
flavorText: With this, you can bring down stronger and taller trees.

name: Steel Axe
flavorText: With this, you can bring down stronger and taller trees.

name: Latinum Axe
flavorText: An axe strong enough to free the spirits of ents from the bodies that entomb them.

name: Temprous Staff
flavorText: Imbued with the power of ages past, this staff can reunite ent spirits with their former bodies, granting them new life.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: Allows harvesting of limestone, marble, and gold ore.
flavorText: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Steel Pickaxe
description: Allows harvesting of quartz, obsidian, and latinum ore.
flavorText: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Latinum Pickaxe
description: Allows harvesting of diamond, unbelievium ore, lustrial ore, and spectrus ore.
flavorText: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Refined Steel Axe
flavorText: A stronger, more durable axe.

name: Refined Latinum Axe
flavorText: A stronger, more durable axe.

name: Emblem of the Ents
description: Grants an extra 75% ents reanimated per harvest.
flavorText: Imbues revived ents with far greater power.

name: Refined Iron Pickaxe
flavorText: A stronger, more durable pickaxe.

name: Refined Steel Pickaxe
flavorText: A stronger, more durable pickaxe.

name: Refined Latinum Pickaxe
flavorText: A stronger, more durable pickaxe.

name: Expanded Burner
flavorText: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores more efficiently.

name: Enhanced Burner
flavorText: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores more efficiently.

name: Refined Burner
flavorText: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores more efficiently.

name: Lavish Burner
flavorText: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores more efficiently.

name: Excessive Burner
flavorText: Alright, you can't possibly need this much space.

name: Temprous Purifier
flavorText: Increases the purity of temprous ingots processed by the temprous distillery.

name: Triplet Axes
flavorText: I'm not even going try and figure out how this works, okay?

name: Lumber Mill
flavorText: Processes logs at a rate far beyond what's possible manually.

name: Enchanted Latinum Axe
flavorText: Enchanted by the spirits of fallen ents allows this axe's wielder to operate at an unnatural speed.

name: Temprous Siphon
description: Reduces reanimated ent harvesting time by 30%.
flavorText: Using this siphon, ents can regain their full strength much more quickly.

name: Decorated Pickaxe
description: Reduces mining time for metals up to gold ore and minerals up to marble by 12%.
flavorText: Technically these pickaxes aren't any better, but they look pretty. And that's pretty nice.

name: Explosive Mining
description: Reduces mining time for metals up to spectrus ore and minerals up to diamond by 15%.
flavorText: Pickaxes laced with a tiny, tiny amount of black powder. The science seems to add up.

name: Temprous Catalyst
description: Reduces harvesting time for refined temprous ingots by 50%.
flavorText: Speeds up the temprous purification process.

name: Limestone Burner
description: Reduces mining time for bronze ingots by 10%.
flavorText: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Marble Burner
description: Reduces mining time for ingots up to steel by 12%.
flavorText: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Obsidian Burner
description: Reduces mining time for ingots up to gold by 15%.
flavorText: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Diamond Burner
description: Reduces mining time for ingots up to latinum by 15%.
flavorText: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Temprous Burner
description: Reduces mining time for ingots up to temprous by 25%.
flavorText: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Kelley the Deforester
flavorText: Dammit, Jim! I'm a lumberjack, not a doctor!

name: Elder Ent
flavorText: This respected ent elder will offer his services to help guide more of his kin back into this world.

name: Mineral Enthusiast
flavorText: Once an officer of the law, this man has put his career aside to pursue his true passion: mining minerals.

name: Mineral Obsessive
flavorText: This guy REALLY likes minerals!

name: Dwarven Miner
flavorText: Dwarves aren't actually very active miners. This guy just loves his job.

name: Dwarven Champion
flavorText: Dwarves are naturally inclined to be the best at whatever they do, even things that are totally un-dwarfish like mining.

name: Musical Lumberjacks
flavorText: This funny little tune helps the lumberjacks stay focused, but you'll NEVER get it out of your head.

name: Entking
flavorText: With their king at last restored to his former glory, the ents find themselves greatly invigorated.

name: Miner's Guild
flavorText: Form a guild to help your workers hone their skills.

name: Miner Musical
flavorText: Those who underperform are "encouraged" to sing along.

name: Temprous Master
flavorText: There is no other with the prowess this master posesses in handling temprous metal.

name: Fishing Rod
description: Allows harvesting of herring and bass.
flavorText: With this, you can catch some small fish.

name: Gold-tipped Rod
flavorText: The bright metallic tip can attract some highly dangerous, and highly lucrative, fish.

name: Expanded Plots
flavorText: Less Hobbit, more Lord of the Rings.

name: Scarecrow
flavorText: We tried scarycrows first, but they just made things worse.

name: Fishing Net
flavorText: The latest in fishing technology!

name: Sign That Says "Please Swim Into This Net"
flavorText: That I just found.

name: Automated Harvesting
flavorText: These tools practically move themselves!

name: Fisherman
description: Allows workers to be assigned to hunting fish.

name: Monster Pocketer
description: Allows workers to be assigned to hunting creatures.

name: Personal Chef
description: Allows workers to be assigned to some cooking tasks.
flavorText: Finally, fresh-baked food whenever you like! (Jelly donuts are totally not rice balls shut up)

name: Noseless Chef
description: Allows workers to be assigned to cooking fish.
flavorText: This chef is powerful enough to withstand the overwhelming smell of the sea.

name: Five-star Restaurant
description: Allows workers to be assigned to cooking creatures.
flavorText: Only the finest in anachronistic dining!

name: Farmer Dating App
description: Workers gain 200% more crops per harvest.
flavorText: Our top scientists have yet to determine what an "app" is.

name: Hunting Season
description: Workers gain 200% more fish/animals per harvest.
flavorText: Wabbit season! Dragon season!

name: Food Critic
description: Workers cook 200% more food per harvest.

name: Temporal Cooking
description: Workers cook 500% more food per harvest.
flavorText: Transports your food to a time when the world was covered in flames. It helps cook your steaks a bit quicker, if a tiny bit irradiated.

name: Perfect Oven
flavorText: "And now, the end is near..."
